attributes.action: Consider debates to lower university fees to £3000 a year from £9250.
attributes.additional_details: It will allow young people to have an easier access to high levels of education, which almost all jobs require. It will give students a chance to build a career and life without having to worry about paying back a ludicrous student loan. Finally in the long term it will benefit the country as there will be more people with higher skilled, therefore higher paid jobs, working in the UK allowing us to boost the economy.
attributes.background: To debate and discuss the issues that students have with high university fees, and how we can lower them effectively.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/597927
